name: Spectacular Skiing
description:
SPECTACULAR SKIING

Ski and shoot down levels while jumping off ramps and doing sick tricks. 

Tanka has taken over the mountain, and everyone has gotten involved, from the military to bandits, and you. Beat the runs and take him out to win the game. 

Ski, WITH GUNS

SKI down procedurally generated levels. Optimize the way you play to get the best score!

SHOOT enemies as they hurl down the runs next to you. 

UPGRADE with Perks, weapons, abilities, and weapon mods that you can customize to your leisure to fit your specific playstyle. 

Controls:

A/D: Strafe side to side

Mouse: Aim

Shift: Ability (you have to buy one first!) 

Left Mouse Button: Shoot!

R: Reload

Space (hold): Spin, can only do if you are in the air. Get in the air by jumping off ramps
